item.title: Putting animated SVGs of Terminal Output into Github READMEs
item.description: Have you just written a new ✨fancy CLI✨ and want to demo it in your Github Readme? Recording your terminal output is a nice way to demonstrate the experience. Here’s an example of what we’re going to make: Steps Install Dependencies asciinema: brew install asciinema svg-term-cli: npm install -g svg-term-cli Setup your terminal Some tips: Font/screen size matters. The asciinema output will look just as it does in your terminal. You’ll probably want to bump up the font-size and shrink down the terminal so that the text is legible in your README.
